page.title: 05Out of town shopping.
page.content: A major shopping centre is growing near Rayleigh Weir.The site is close to the junction of the A127 with an estimated population of 300000 in a 30 minute drive.The units include a major food store,furniture and other nation- al retailers.Smaller shops also cater for needs such as newspapers.The site has a car park and easy access, alth- ough peak hour congestion has yet to be relieved by a flyover.The effects on local shops has yet to be measured and the increase in population provides some extra people locally.A similar development within a 5 mile radius at Basildon where there is an enclosed centre may attract some of the customers.With a gradual increase in housing demand and a growing need for pm shopping by car such centre will multiply.
